campaign.story:
Odd Draw is a hilarious and strategic table top game. Players select and interpret 3 cards and create a drawing based on them. Then, they must think quickly to invent a clever story explaining how the character they've created fits a "circumstance" the dealer has selected. The thing is, no one knows what the circumstance is until AFTER they’re done drawing!
Circumstances include: Who would you trust to babysit your kids for the weekend? Who’s the real Batman? (NSFW - Who is cooking meth in Albuquerque? Who would give the best ****job?)
With a new circumstance every round, the game constantly changes, challenging players to think quickly and strategically and be creative. NO ART SKILLS REQUIRED! CONFUSED? DON'T WORRY - IT'S EXPLAINED STEP-BY-STEP BELOW.
Odd Draw is perfect for you if you love: pissing yourself from laughter, debating (using your brain), pulling funny stories from your you know what..., games like Exploding Kittens and Cards Against Humanity, good times, trying new things, dolphins and/or puppies.
HAVE FUN!
- The Odd Draw team
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
For our last Kickstarter project, with the help of 271 backers around the world, we were able to produce a deck of good deed cards. We had gone through dozens of suppliers sampling their quality of cards and boxes. We reached out to many of those same suppliers for quotes on Odd Draw, but because this game is a lot larger than a 56 card deck, we reached out to a few dozen other suppliers as well, including the suppliers who produced Exploding Kittens and Cards Against Humanity!

All of the artwork and designs are complete for this game, and we have a top 5 list of suppliers waiting on stand by. No matter how much this campaign raises, you will get an amazing game with high quality paper and materials, but it can be upgraded and be even better. 

The supplier we choose will ultimately depend on how much is raised in this campaign, as each supplier can offer us different things like box upgrades (embossed text, foil print, glossy finish), and higher quality cards (thicker, more durable, linen finish etc). We want this campaign to be as successful as possible so we can produce the absolute finest quality finish possible for you! So please share our project with your friends, and let's make this game the best it can be! Remember, you get free rewards for referring friends too! Thank you so much for your support! :)

- The Odd Draw Team
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Overview
Devil's Advocate is a table top card game designed for parties of 4-16 people. It draws inspiration from: Would You Rather?, Poker, Rock-Paper-Scissors and people who like to argue on Facebook (everyone).
The Product
Inside and out, Devil's Advocate is a beautifully designed card game. You'll be proud to display it on your shelf, and even prouder when you use the game to prove to your friends how much better at arguing you are. The final deck will be composed of 504 poker-sized playing cards inside a boldly colored box. Those choosing the "Hellfire Package" will receive additional items (see rewards section).
What's Unique
Like most creative products, Devil's Advocate is a combination of many ideas. In terms of game mechanics, the reason DA is superior to other games on the market is that it requires each player to be involved in every round. And because it's not a winner take all scenario during each of those rounds, all players will feel motivated to participate throughout the entire game. If you'd like to see more detailed instructions, you can do so here.
Why Pledge Now
Supporting this Kickstarter will ensure Devil's Advocate becomes a reality. And by backing it here and now, not only will you be getting it for less than retail, but the first 1000 backers will also get the game before the holidays.
Gratitude
Designer: The extremely talented Josh Boston
Advisors: Katie Kendall, Steve Kendall, Adam Kmiec, Adam DeVarney, Tyler Travitz, John Geletka, Tim Dres, Tim Harris.
Email Provider: Active Campaign and John Morrison
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Paper cuts. Lots of paper cuts. But seriously, this is a pretty simple project for anyone who is good at planning ahead (which I am). I have the designs, I have a local printer in Chicago, and I have a partner for distribution. My biggest challenge is getting these games to everyone before the holidays, but assuming the funding is on course mid-way through I'll get started early on printing before the campaign is even over. As you can imagine, small delays may pop-up here and there, but my aim is to make sure that the first 1000 backers get this game before they slice the first Christmas ham, light the first Hanukkah candle, or perform the first feat of strength for Festivus.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Guess who collectively helped Devil's Advocate reach $20,000 and now will receive a free upgraded stainless steel reader card? YOU.
Now it's onto the next stretch goal at $30K: The Mini-NSFW Expansion Deck.
It's pretty safe to say that Devil's Advocate is a PG-13 game. This was done intentionally because party games are often played with family. While it definitely is edgy, you won't have to provide grandma with a detailed explanation of "smegma." That said, many R-Rated cards were written and ultimately left out of the final deck. With your help, if the Kickstarter hits $30,000 in the next 10 days, I will send all backers (at the $25 level and higher) a free mini-expansion pack with a set of NSFW reader cards.

campaign.story:
Greetings & Salutations!
Thank you for visiting our campaign! If you are here, you may have a love for great grandma Gloria's mahogany coffee table and a fierce hatred for condensation. Maybe your constant ceramic coffee cup companion calls for a custom coaster. Perhaps, your affection for fine furniture frustrates you for lack of matching accessories. Whatever your need, we assume you are here to solve a problem and we have just the solution for you!
Everybody needs a coaster!
Want to add a handsome accessory to your drink-ware? Looking to protect your heirloom furniture? Want a personalized piece of art in your dining room? Our simple, elegant, and customizable coasters crafted from verified sustainable or reclaimed hardwoods will be an eye-catching addition to your table or bar.
These hardwood coasters are available in 3 shapes and 4 wood varieties, each measuring 4" across and 1/4" thick. Choose from circle, rounded square, and curved square (see image below for exact shapes). Finished with multiple coats of acrylic lacquer for a great shine, long life, and water resistance.
About Our Wood
One of the core principles at our woodshop has always been to use reclaimed, salvaged, and sustainable wood sources. The Walnut, Maple, and Cherry woods used in our coasters are harvested as part of Appalachian Hardwood Verified Sustainable program. Click on the image below to find out more!
The "Blue Pine" wood that is used for our coasters is actually from a tree called the Lodgepole Pine. These trees have been killed by beetles carrying a fungus that changes the color of the wood. These trees are removed from the forest floor and milled into lumber to prevent risk of injury and forest fires. To learn more about the Pine Beetle Epidemic, head over to National Geographic.
Coaster Wood Choices
Coaster Shape Choices
We are currently offering 3 basic shapes for our coasters. We may add a few more options as stretch goals, but the 3 starter shapes are below:
Monogram Options
For the custom engraved coaster rewards, a monogram is included. Monograms come in two varieties. A single letter monogram usually represents a family name. A 3 letter monogram can represent a person's initials or two individuals' first name initials and their last name initial in the middle. You can select from one of the 3 styles below for your monogram:
Rewards
Add-ons
In addition to a coaster reward, you can add on the following items by increasing your pledge the appropriate amount:
$5 - Whidden's Woodshop Tote Bag
$8 - Resuable Alder Wood Thank You Card
$10 Reward: Alder Wood Thank You Card
Why Kickstarter?
Whidden's Woodshop is currently our young family's primary income. We have been running our small family business for almost a year at this point. We currently have Etsy shop and sell items locally at craft fairs and art shows, but that isn't enough to provide for our growing family of 6 (and 2 cats).
Kickstarter allows for global exposure and creates permanent relationships with people who are passionate about what we create and also with potential retail buyers.
Our goal for this campaign is to raise enough funds to fulfill all our rewards, purchase additional equipment for our shop, and to provide for monthly expenses for our family.
Check out our campaign statistics at Kicktraq!
Our coaster cuddling cat, Bubbas.
Check out our Etsy store to see what else we create!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There is only one risk associated with this campaign. Because all of the items are handmade, we could run into delays if I get sick or some other unforeseen event occurs.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

That means that by the 2nd week of November, the majority of rewards will be shipping!

100% Funded in 10 Days!
We're a little behind, but we are happy to announce we have hit and surpassed our goal of $1800! Thanks to everyone so far who has supported us! We're excited to see what the rest of the campaign has in store.
Christmas is coming!

campaign.story:
We care about biking. Not just exercise. It’s experience.
As bikers ourselves, we very much enjoy the whole combination of self-relaxation, feeling the breeze and socializing with bros and sis. Bike lights have always been one of the guards to secure our journey. However, traditional bike lights have little more than on and off, and operation between the front and rear lights have not been convenient either, spoiling our mood.
With STELLIGHT, we have two goals – to ease fellows from worrisome troubles with bike lights; to add unique fun and versatility by having different blinks to suit mood and purposes with our patent pending technology.
                     Flexible Mounting - Leaving space for other gadgets
Keep calm and feel it
I’m energetic
Trendsetter
To see
Alert reckless drivers
Save energy on a lit road
Control “The REAR” with the FRONT KNOB
                     STELLIGHT APP
Supports both Andriod and iPhone
Upload light patterns from STELLIGHT APP to the FRONT or the REAR wirelessly by BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy Connectivity)
Smartphone not involved once patterns are uploaded to the FRONT or the REAR
Change pattern of the FRONT and the REAR by rotating FRONT knob, since the two are connected by BLE
STELLIGHT is simple to use!
by STELLIGHT WEB
by sharing with friends
by DIY light patterns:
On STELLIGHT APP
Supports both Android and iPhone
DIY: design brightness of each of the six LEDs and interval of flash
Change of brightness of each LED up to 50Hz, enough for smooth fade-in and fade-out patterns or high frequency flashing alert patterns
DIY light patterns in your own way. One light, unlimited possibilities!
DIY whatever light pattern of your taste
STELLIGHT APP
                      As lovers and supporters of Kickstarter, we designed a limited edition, each with a serial number from 0-99. It’s unique, incomparable by any other lights.
To design a bike light best for biker’ use, we have poured hours into researching and surveying a large number of bikers. What’s good about the current bike lights? What needs to be improved? What do they look for if they buy a new bike light? If they can be a little bit greedy, what funny points would they like to add to the light?
There have been a lot of changes from the very first design of STELLIGHT.
Initial Designs of STELLIGHT
And here comes the final version.
Final Design
CNC Prototyping
Field Testing and Photo Shooting
The Grabo Team, a team of energetic and devoted electronic and software engineers, have had several years of experience in electronic engineering and product design projects, one of which being GestureR, our former successful project on Kickstarter. STELLIGHT is our first product designed not just for electronic DIY lovers but also the general public.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
CNC machined housing is used for STELLIGHT to make it durable and fashionable. Though its production time is longer than plastic counterparts, we are confident that the manufacture of STELLIGHT will be on schedule since they will be produced by CNC factories which we have partnered for years.
For the good of early backers, the assembly and packing procedures will also be split into smaller lots instead of one big lot. The shipping will be done in the order of backing.
Given the years of experience in developing innovating new products, we are confident about managing the production process and any issues that may arise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

During the funding period, we received a lot of constructive comments from you guys. Also, we approached some bike shops and distributors around the world. There are quite some positive feedbacks from them and some of them even gave us useful advices on how to make the light to be a better product. campaign.story:
Deuce Badge: Badass Detective is a 30 minute adult humored animated comedy series. Located  in the fictional Hampton City, where crime is at an all time high, Detective Deuce Badge is it's only hope. This self proclaimed lady getting, heart breaking, ass kicking pretty boy has zero tolerance for evil and is determined to bring all lawbreakers to justice. With the help of a supporting group off odd - but interesting - cohorts, Deuce will be sure to piss you off while protecting his city.

***WARNING***
Detective Deuce Badge is usually outwardly insulting, sometimes displaying moronic behavior with little to no regard for your feelings and or opinions.
Just don't call him a douche bag!
MY GOAL
My name is Michael Zachariah White. Screenwriter and Creator of Deuce Badge: Badass Detective. I created Deuce Badge some years back with a dream of bringing him to life. Not knowing which avenues to take or what resources to utilize I found myself stuck in a dead end. For years, Deuce was nothing  more than an idea...Until now!
With your support I will finally be able to have my pilot script professionally animated with HD rendering and studio quality voice-overs from a team of talented voice actors. Your support will also fund my marketing campaign to TV producers and my entry into independent film festivals. I want to make this show a household hit and I want you to be apart of this journey.

campaign.story:
A 3 Meter Extra-Long, Tangle-Free, Charging Cable
When we began designing our charging cable, we realized that there were other, similar (yet less reliable) products on the market, but they contained a few critical flaws to their design:
● Too short! There is nothing worse than trying to charge your phone at one outlet, but realizing that the nearest flat surface, or where you were planning to store your phone, is on the other side of the room! This is never a problem with our strong cable.
● Tangles = Breakage For those of us who have used charging cables, we know that tangles aren’t only unsightly, but a tangle left to its own devices can cause breakage along the length or end of the cable. Eventually, it causes the cable to rip or break altogether. Not only does our unique cover protect the cable from breakage, but it also prevents tangles outright with a nylon fabric casing.
● Cheaply Made Products Don’t Last Sure, you could buy a dollar-store charging cable as a last resort, but how long will that last? Cheaply made charging cables are notorious for breaking, not holding the charge, or even completely falling out of the device mid-charge. Why risk your expensive device with a cable that could possible break your phone? Our product contains quality materials produced by careful craftsmanship by a small, independent company. 
Impact:  The Strong Cable features incredible innovation, and vastly improves upon the average charging cable. We have built solid relationships with our suppliers, and we have already thoroughly vetted their supplies and our resulting products. We have a strong foundation for this product, but we need your support to help us get there! 
What We Need & What You Get: We are seeking the support of the community to help us meet our 400 item MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity). By donating to our campaign, you are helping us reach our goals and push towards wide distribution of our product, marketing the Strong Cable, and much more. 
Additional funding will be used towards the costs related to rewards, furthering our campaign and more! To thank our generous backers, we are offering numerous exciting rewards at a variety of donation levels. Please view the rewards on the right-hand side of the page and select the reward that works for you!
Other Ways You Can Help: If you can’t make a donation at this time, there are still other ways you can help us reach our goals! Please take a moment to share our campaign with your friends and family via social media, email, and word of mouth. With your support, we can reach our funding goals and meet our minimum order quantity requirements!
iPhone 6s, 6, 5s, 5c, 5
iPad Air 2, Air, Mini
iPod Nano 7
iPod Touch 5
Android Devices (Micro USB)
Windows Phones (Micro USB)
This timeline provides us with an adequate amount to deliver the Strong Cable. We do not foresee any potential delays and have done our best to smooth out any kinks in our process. If any further delays are expected our backers will be notified immediately! 
The Strong Cable will be sent to Apple to receive MFI certification. This will allow us to use the "Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad" logo on our product. MFI certified accessories use certified Apple connectors purchased directly from Apple. This means that you will receive a higher quality product. We have built solid relationships with our suppliers who have experience producing MFI certified products. We have no worries that our product will receive this certification and have a strong faith in our product.
Thank you in advance for your support and donations!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:

● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay
A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat. 

● Fulfillment Capacity 
If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.

Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Jack Kudos came to light as we want to create a family friendly game that everyone can enjoy. It's simple with a sweet and fruity story line. 
Some say, "Laughter is the best medicine." It's good for your health in so many ways, as it reduces stress, pain and conflict. It increases your heart rate and releases a ton of endorphins to make you happy. Laughing is also contagious!
We here at BondsWell enjoy making others laugh and we love to laugh ourselves. We feel that this game will only increase that joy and make the world even happier. Our hearts are into this project and we will not disappoint! We invite you to join us in this happiness and fun-filled journey for all.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have had the idea for quite some time so we have gone through many scenarios on how the game can be played. We will start with the basics and add in more gamification concepts so it's so enjoyable that you do not want to put it down!

In addition, we have created most of the graphics already (as you can see from our video above) with critical thought and lots of love.

It's time to turn this from project "hopeful" to project "for reals". 

We have a good core team and a steel-ironed plan in place and will do what it takes to bring Jack Kudos to life! We promise to keep you posted on the progress as well.

We invite you to join us in this happiness and fun-filled journey for all.

Learn more about bondswell.com - sign up with your VIP invite code - kickstarter

Creators: Michelle Tsing, Lou Stone, Andrea Ator
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.creator_bio:
BondsWell, Inc.
First created · 0 backed
Sparking creativity everywhere. bondswell.com is a place where you can show off your talents and express whatever; when you create bonds...See more

updates.update_content: Hello all and our wonderful backers! We want to give you all a big THANK YOU to pledging your support. We really appreciate all your efforts. We have decided to reevaluate our project plan — which means we are postponing the Jack Kudos project —for now. We will be re-posting this project with some changes in the near future. We will keep you posted when that happens, so thanks again! Hippo hugs!
We are very pleased to announce Yu-Kai Chou's support for our project. You can meet him in person! Oh yeah!

updates.update_userinfo: Jack eats fruit, kids eat better!

campaign.story:
For many years we searched for high quality leather bags that are handcrafted with an affordable price, but what we found where a market overrun by cheap, shoddily produced items, in mass production. We found ENQUEUR & CO. because we knew that we can do better than that. Our aim is to create a new masterpiece. A high quality product of which people could be proud of wearing it. 
Our products:
made of the world's best leather
handcrafted in Germany
customized by you
ENQUEUR & CO. is a Luxury Leather Goods brand which offers the highest quality luxury leather products, handcrafted by skilled leather artisans in Germany and made from the best quality materials. This means online using the world’s best leather like the finest Horween Chromexcel ® and Shell Cordovan Leather from the Horween Leather Company from Chicago, USA or Italian Calf Saffiano Leather. 
We have built our company on the belief that we are only as good as the quality of our products. We live this principles in every aspect of our business. The materials, the craftsmanship, the customer service and the prices, all tie into the end result - producing the best leather products for our customers. 
At ENQUEUR, we know that a bag is more than just a bag. It is the item that you carry your entire life in. You need a quality bag that you feel safe and confident carrying your laptop, tablet, work documents and other items in. 
We offer the highest quality products that you can imagine, and that means using the highest quality materials. In order to buy the types of leathers we want to use for creating the Paisly bag we need to meet minimum quantity requirements from the tanneries. Each of our products is hand made in Germany by skilled leather artisans using traditional techniques and only the finest materials.
The Paisley bag is specifically designed to meet the needs of the modern person, who needs a functional and reliable bag that also whispers quality and elegance. To make it even more personal you can customize your bag with different color options and add your initials to is, so that it to fit perfectly to you.  
We are so confident in the quality of the Paisley bag, that we offer a simple and straight forward lifetime guarantee. Should your bag ever breaks at any time after you purchase it we offer free repairs or a replacement bag world wide.   
The Paisly bag is our masterpiece. We spend all our love and time into this fantastic bag, to offer you a bag that you can proudly carry around every day, and that you just love.
We have designed the Paisly Bag in two version: "The Paisly Bag W" in a classic and slim, sharp timeless look and "The Paisly Bag Q" - which is our favorite - in a slightly bigger version with rounded corners and enclosing straps. 
The ENQUEUR Paisly bag has a timeless minimalistic Italian design and is handcrafted by our skilled leather artisans in Germany. With its slim and classic profile, the Paisley Bag whispers elegance and quality
For those who like it more fancy, we have designed "The Pasily Bag T" which has the exact size and design like "The Paisly Bag W", the interior look also exactly the same. The only difference is, that the bag is made from finest Ital. Nappa leather with a contrast label. The Paisly Bag T is available in unlimited color combination. Just choose your favorite.
We use for our bags 3 different types of the world's finest leathers:
the famous Chromexcell® leather from the Horween Leather Company in Chicago 
Italian calf Saffiano leather 
Finest vegetable tanned Italian nappa leather
There is nothing worse than spending money on a cheap bag, only to have the strap break or the zipper jam before you’ve had a chance to really use it. This is a problem that you will never have with ENQUEUR’s Paisley bag. Carefully crafted out of the finest leather, the Paisley Bag offers you the reliable quality you need, combined with the timeless style you desire and a lifetime gurarantee.
The Paisly bag contains a protected inner pocket that will hold a laptop up to 15 inches long, so you can take your work with you without sacrificing style. There is plenty more room in this bag as well. You can fit your tablet, two pens, and several documents as well.  
There is even a special RFID blocked pocket for your wallet or your passport, so you can feel that your most important items are secure when you travel. The Paisly Bag W and the Paisly Bag T have exactly the same dimensions. Both Bags have a contrast interor, made from a soft but very strong fabric which is also used in the sailing industry and is available in different colors. There is enough space for your laptop, a tablet a note book and pens. 
The Paisly Bag Q is a bit bigger than the Paisly Bag W. The handles go around the bag and carry all your belongings. The interior is made from finest Italien suede and is available in different colors. There is enough space for your laptop, a charger, a tablet a note book, pens and even more.
Each of our bags are handmade by skilled leather artisans in Bavaria in Germany with more than 100 years of experience in the business. These artisans have served high-end luxury companies such as Maybach, Mercedes Benz, Bogner, Fendi and Bugatti, so they know a thing or two about quality. Combining years of experience with traditional techniques and modern tools to create some of the world’s finest leather goods.
To find the best materials for our products, we tested hundreds of leathers, zippers and closures. We travelled through USA and Europe and visited the best suppliers ourselves. Only that's how we can make sure that every leather, zipper and strap is made from the best in their field.
The most important material is the leather.
We are proud to work together with the most premier tanneries in the world:
The Horween Leather Company from Chicago, USA
Bonaudo SRL, Italy
Artigiano del Cuoio, Italy
Horween is one of the famoust tanneries worldwide and is one out of two tanneries in the world who can make Shell Cordovan leather. Horween lethers is without a doubt the best available leather.

Both Italien tanneries only produce vegetable tanned leathers and supply many top luxury brands worldwide.
ENQUEUR was founded with the vision of producing high quality and reasonably priced leather products by cutting out the middleman. At ENQUEUR, we work directly with manufacturers and the tanneries to bring you the highest quality products at the best prices possible.
In order to produce the Paisly Bag, we need your help raising at least 6,000€. 
Here is what we will do with higher amounts of funding:  
With 6,000€, we will be able to afford the minimum quantity from our tanneries
With 7,000€ we can produce gift boxes and dust bags 
With 8,000€, we can provide more Horween leather types and color options, like Latigo, Chromexcel (Hores Front), all Nappa leather colors will be unlocked
With 10,000€, we can provide more interior color options and more fabrics, like silk and suede, we will also add three colors for the metal hardware (Zippers, Closure, Holders etc.)
With 12,000€, we can provide the Paisly Bag made from Shell Cordovan leather 
With 15,000€, we can design & manufacture a Paisly bag for women 
from 20,000€, we can start to design more premium bags, such as weekender bag which is already designed in our sketchbook
50,000€ - 100,000€ we will invest in retail store interior and will open a pop-up store
from 100,000€ we will launch our first retail store
 Special Rewards!
As soon as funding successfully closes, we’ll get the ball rolling with production and deliveries. We will already have backer choices for design and color so the team will be focused entirely on fulfilling orders and getting them delivered. 
If we reach our founding goal earlier than expacted we will deilver sooner.
Thanks! 
Thanks to everyone who dedicated their time, energy and good mojo towards helping us get this up and running! Special thanks to the Kickstarter community and the Backers Club you are amazing. 
To Frank G. our model who shot the video with us at 40°C hot day, thanks a lot.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We see the main challenge in spreading the word and reaching enough backers to reach our funding goal. With the help of our friends and family, the Kickstarter community, we hope we will be able to make this project happen. 
Producing handmade high quality luxury goods is never easy. However we are confident and trust in our team of leather artisans that we will deliver on time and of course with the exceptional quality. We have produced all of our leather goods before, for our product test group and have learned what can go wrong and we now know how to avoid it. 

Over the last month we have made several iterations of prototypes, we are proud to say, that we are ready to start and to prodvide you the premium leather product you desiere!

campaign.story:
STELLIGHT
We wanted to design bike lights because WE ARE BIKERS.
Intrigued by the speed of cycling and freed from worries brought by bike lights, we, however, were somehow frustrated by the stereotyping of bike lights. Traditional bike lights have a limited choice of light patterns for various purposes while riding and suiting our taste. Bikers’ control over the lights, especially the rear one, is not convenient either.
Aspired to work for the good of bikers, Grabo targeted at designing biker-friendly, personalized and customizable bike lights which at the same time make use of our QR code sharing system (Patent Pending) to make the whole light more helpful and enjoyable.
Putting our creativity into practice, we proudly present to you the new generation of bike lights – STELLIGHT.
Stellight - "THE FRONT"
Stellight - "THE REAR"
The metal housing makes STELLIGHT strong, durable and fashionable.
Check out on the different colors to match you bike and suit your taste.
Standard Color - Silver Grey
Special Color - Blue
Special Color - Orange
Special Color - Red
Special Color - Black
The prerequisite of bike light is safety for bikers. STELLIGHT has the brightness of 360 lumen (“THE FRONT”) for you to be seen clearly on the road. Enjoy carefree riding. 
As bikers, we understand it is annoying to adjust the rear light while cycling, because it isn’t convenient and does not look cool. STELLIGHT is designed to be biker-friendly. Simply rotate the FRONT KNOB to turn on and/or alter the light pattern of the “THE REAR”, without fetching your arm backwards.
Control “THE REAR” with the FRONT KNOB
Match your Bike, Match your Mood. Every little part of your bike is a reflection of your personality and deserves to be noticed. With STELLIGHT, biking will be more than enjoyable when you can show your mood and personality through self-defined light patterns. Different light patterns also go for different purposes, say high frequency alert and energy-saving patterns.
If you’re not satisfied with our six built-in customizable light patterns, why not download from our STELLIGHT WEB?
Up till now 60+ light patterns have been constructed and will be available soon on STELLIGHT WEB! Have a preview of some of them in our promotional video!
Wide range of light patterns
  Not content with the above? Quench your thirst by watching more!
Plus any pattern you can imagine!
The power of creativity lies in the human mind and can never be underestimated. Each of the “THE FRONT” and “THE REAR” consists of six LEDs. You can design the brightness of each LED and interval of flash with the user-friendly STELLIGHT APP, which supports Android and iPhone. The change of brightness for each LED can be up to 50Hz, which is adequate for smooth fade-in and fade-out patterns or high frequency flashing alert patterns.
With your creativity, there can be more than a million possible light patterns. Learn how to:
DIY whatever light pattern of your taste
STELLIGHT APP
Fascinated by your own creation? Share your masterpiece with us on STELLIGHT WEB and enjoy the applause!
To offer you the greatest room for creativity and free you from worries, STELLIGHT APP gives you an estimate of the burn time of your designed light pattern and re-estimates it upon your every tiny change to the pattern. With the help of STELLIGHT and STELLIGHT APP, you can always design the optimal light pattern for your taste and the length of the cycling journey, but never be bothered by inability to estimate the burn time! Happy cycling!
Cycling can be more fun if you do it with friends who enjoy the same interest. If you’re generous, share your light pattern, be it hunt from STELLIGHT WEB or self-designed with your creative mind, by letting your friends scan the QR code and uploading it onto their own STELLIGHT. The sharing of light patterns among various STELLIGHT is done offline WITHOUT connection to the Internet, i.e. anywhere, anytime! The fun will be more than expected!
  The same light pattern can also help you locate your biking friends while riding on the busy road without verbally speak to them.
System Workflow
The housing of STELLIGHT can resist the splash of water and free you from frustration under unstable weather. Rain? Not a problem anymore! Look cool in any ride, anywhere, anytime.
Everyone deserves the right to have fun. STELLIGHT is designed with love and care, and can be mounted and dismounted no matter you are left-handed or right-handed. The FRONT KNOB can be rotated with either hand.
Flexible Mounting - Leaving space for other gadgets
For Left-handers & Right-handers
The magic is, even when STELLIGHT is mounted at different orientations, say upside down for left-handers or right-handers, the set light pattern will remain unchanged in terms of its direction. The rotation direction for the FRONT KNOB for turning on "THE REAR" or altering light patterns is also the same in whatever orientation STELLIGHT is set. We keep everything simple for you! Be worry-free!
Who wants to be upset by running out power? STELLIGHT keeps going with AAA alkaline or rechargeable batteries. Simply grab equivalents in nearby convenience stores and keep going in your cycling journey.
STELLIGHT offers flexibility in terms of number of batteries used:
At least 2 batteries: to maintain optimal performance, for longer rides.
1 battery: for emergency use
To ensure stable brightness of the light, three individual power channels are used and each supplies current to two LEDs. Each power channel has its exclusive power management IC and power circuit.
STELLIGHT adopts the latest BLE technology (Bluetooth Low Energy Connectivity) to maximize the convenience for bikers. The upload of light patterns from smartphone to “THE FRONT” and “THE REAR” is done wirelessly by BLE.
While bikers may like to make everything simple and be carefree while riding, the use of smartphone is NOT a must once light patterns have been uploaded to “THE FRONT” or “THE REAR”. Patterns of “THE FRONT” can be changed by rotating FRONT KNOB, and those of “THE REAR” can be changed also by rotating FRONT KNOB since the two lights are connected wirelessly by BLE. We make everything simple for you!
To design a bike light best for biker’ use, we have poured hours into researching and surveying a large number of bikers. What’s good about the current bike lights? What needs to be improved? What do they look for if they buy a new bike light? If they can be a little bit greedy, what funny points would they like to add to the light?
There have been a lot of changes from the very first design of STELLIGHT.
Initial Designs of STELLIGHT
And here comes the final version.
Final Design
CNC Prototyping
Field Testing and Photo Shooting
Dimension of "THE FRONT" and "THE REAR"
Size Comparison with Garmin Edge 510 Bike Computer
(#)For reference. The actual burn time depends on the light pattern customized and adopted by the biker.
(*)Available upon meeting USD 100K stretch goal
Super early birds will enjoy our Kickstarter Limited Edition which has the eye-catching color of metallic “Kickstarter” green for both the housing and the mount. Each of the 99 limited edition STELLIGHT is also marked with a serial number which shows its uniqueness that is incomparable by any other lights. Such limited editions will be exclusive for Kickstarter supporters, and will not be available in the retail market.
Kickstarter Limited Edition
Unique serial numbers marked on battery covers
The Grabo Team, a team of energetic and devoted electronic and software engineers, have had several years of experience in electronic engineering and product design projects, one of which being GestureR, our former successful project on Kickstarter. STELLIGHT is our first product designed not just for electronic DIY lovers but also the general public.
Keith Tung
Software Engineer and Product Development Manager
Sammel Tung
Electronic Engineer and Production Manager
Dan Yan
Mechanical Engineer and Production Manager
 Mouse Ho
Software Engineer (smartphone applications)
 Jonathan Yip, WingPui
Software Engineer
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
CNC machined housing is used for STELLIGHT to make it durable and fashionable. Though its production time is longer than plastic counterparts, we are confident that the manufacture of STELLIGHT will be on schedule since they will be produced by CNC factories which we have partnered for years.

For the good of early backers, the assembly and packing procedures will also be split into smaller lots instead of one big lot. The shipping will be done in the order of backing.

Given the years of experience in developing innovating new products, we are confident about managing the production process and any issues that may arise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hurray! STELLIGHT re-launched! 
We’re so ecstatic to share this new gen smart bike light with all our biking fellows! Come join the move of STELLIGHT for customizable and sharable blink patterns! 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/grabo/stellight-the-next-generation-smart-bike-light

Thanks for all backers’ support and suggestions, we’ve gone through a process of fine-tuning STELLIGHT and we’re happy to announce several changes!
1. The price of the relaunched product will be lowered!
2. Several new features will be added to make STELLIGHT even more user-friendly and funny.

The brightness of STELLIGHT is best shown in the shadow. The lights alert bikers and pedestrians, as well as visualizes you path. See and to be seen with STELLIGHT! Thrilled? Stay tuned and look forward to our Re-launch!

We are truly thankful for all the support and comments for STELLIGHT so far. Upon all the advice, we would like to fine-tune its features and therefore temporarily terminate the launch in this round. We are confident to bring to you an improved version of STELLIGHT in the Re-launch.
Of particular importance to us are the two remarks regarding the possibility to adopt rechargeable batteries and reduce price. Concerning the first, we have already been developing the new version of STELLIGHT which adopts a built-in rechargeable lithium battery. About the price, we fully understand the concern of all backers and are proactively investigating the room of lowering the production cost. Hopefully the reduced cost can in turn allow a lower marked price of STELLIGHT, which is more appealing to all backers.

The app functionality of STELLIGHT allows bikers to change light patterns upon their wish, before rides or during rides. The app also allows you to visualize your creativity and design your own blink pattern, which is not paralleled by any other bikers.
Get yours and taste it!

We’ve changed our slogan to make it more dynamic and motivating. 23 days to go, keep sharing the word. Together we can bring STELLIGHT to life!

campaign.story:
Founded over four years ago by two former Naval Explosive Ordnance Disposal officers, Bullets2Bandages believes a strong social mission is a sustainable way to build a growing business.
Bullets2Bandages is a mission-driven, socially conscious apparel and accessories and unique company designed to give thanks to veterans, those fighting for our country, and the families who provide them with love and support at home by partnering with veteran charities and non-profits across the country.
We come to you on Kickstarter to help us kick start our newest products:
An 8oz leather-wrapped flask made with premium stainless steel that's leak-free and twice as thick as the industry standard. The steel is wrapped in leather from the Horween Leather Company in Chicago, the same tannery the National Football League uses for leather to make its footballs, then hand-stitched together. 
A 16oz (pint size) mason jar wrapped in leather from the Horween Leather Company in Chicago, the same tannery the National Football League entrusts for the leather to make its footballs. It includes a leak-free lid so you can throw it in your bag for later use.
Our "Standard Issue Keychain" features MIL-SPEC hardware and the same high-quality Horween Leather.
See below for examples of our products.
Black Flask:
Blue Flask:
Red Flask:
Brown Flask with Custom Engraving:
Blue Mason Jar Wrap:
Brown Keychain:
We will contact you for color selection and engraving at the end of the campaign. 
A big thanks goes to Groundswell Brewing Company in San Diego for allowing us to shoot our video in their taproom.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have ample experience with sourcing and manufacturing these products so we're confident in our ability to ship our rewards according to our predicted timetable. We're simply using this campaign to allow us to scale up rapidly and take advantage of volume discounts made possible by purchasing all the components in a single batch. We will post regular updates as we progress through the stages of production. 

However, if any delays should arise, we will communicate them to our backers immediately.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Orders shipping--let us know if you want the 1776 Co boxes
updates.update_content:
The first dozen or so orders shipped last week and we've gotten a few more on the way yesterday and today -- we'll be doing the remainder of the leather engraving today and tomorrow and should have the custom orders completed by the end of this week.
As we mentioned with our last update, our current holdup is the result of a delay with getting our Bullets2Bandages branded boxes for the flasks...plus an odd issue with us receiving fewer keychain parts than we ordered from our supplier. Both products are due to arrive early next week so once they get here all we'll need to do is put the completed flasks into the boxes and add them to their USPS packages.

updates.update_userinfo: Production is underway--shipping to begin next week
updates.update_content:
Thanks for your patience thus far--while it was great to hit our funding goal, the downside of reaching it on the final day was that we didn't get much lead time to order leather, boxes, and jars prior to the end of the campaign. Add in a few weeks to receive surveys from a majority of our backers (so we know what materials to order) and it's taken us longer than anticipated to get our supplies shipped here and begin production.
Stitching and assembly for the flasks, jars, and keychains is currently underway at a nearby shop and once we have them in-hand we'll begin customization and packaging them for shipment.

We've received survey responses from about 2/3 of our backers but we're still waiting to get input from a decent number of you. Once we've got that information in hand we'll be able to order the correct amount of leather in each particular color and begin stitching things together.
The surveys are pretty simple--we just need to confirm your mailing address and your color/engraving/patch preferences for your products.

THANKS SO MUCH for the last-minute push to help us reach $5,000 -- as soon as things wrap up tomorrow we'll begin contacting backers to sort out details on shipping address, color preferences, custom engraving, patches, etc.

With 35 hours to go we currently need an additional $1,272 in orders to make this campaign happen -- so please click any of the photos or on THIS LINK to back our campaign and get yourself in line for some sweet rewards. Backer rewards start as low as $14 for our hand-stitched, American-made products.
To help push us over the top we've decided to sweeten the deal a bit -- while our standard version of the flasks and mason jars will come with an American flag, we will now allow backers to provide for us to sew onto their rewards. That means (assuming we hit our funding goal) you can send us a -- and they'll still be available with custom engraving provided that you select that option.

We've gotta raise another ~$1,400 in the next three days to make this project a reality and fulfill all the rewards that you've requested...so here's where we can use your help in spreading the word. We'd greatly appreciate you passing our link along to anyone who might be interested in picking up some of these products--think holiday shopping, graduations, promotions, retirements, wedding parties, or any other events that would be good matches for personalized drinkware and accessories

updates.update_userinfo: 11 days to go and over halfway there!
updates.update_content:
Big thanks to everyone who has backed us so far! With a week and a half to go we're sitting $2,300 short of our funding goal so we've got some work left to do. But we're confident we can reach the $5,000 target which will allow us to start production in early August and ship rewards by late August. 
Here's where we can use your help--if you think this is a cool project and want us to get funded so you can receive your reward, please spread the word to anyone you think may be interested. Tell your Facebook friends, tweet the link to our campaign, post our product photos on Instagram or Tumblr...every little bit will help get us closer to being able to provide you with your rewards.

campaign.story:
The Utillix App aims to market the world's first Site Excavation Mapping Tool. It will be presented as a downloadable APP from iTunes and/or Google Play. This App would be suitable for Google Glass as the Utillix App has 3D and augmented views. The Utillix App will be a GPS device for recording and viewing underground infrastructure locations while excavating or installing underground services. In real time, site excavators and utility services can view in 3D what to beneath the ground before beginning work. There will also be a central database to record the new information which will be updated regularly.

The Utillix Site Excavation Mapping Tool is a world first application that is a fusion of technology and functionality.  There is significant danger risk to individuals that excavate without checking for power-lines or pipes.  Owners need to know where safe areas are underground to dig before a job starts and individuals on-site need the visibility of what is underground as they dig.  By using the Site Excavation Mapping Tool excavation is safer, quicker and more accurate thus saving lives, time and money. This site excavation mapping App is bases around real-time visual presentation of the underground infrastructure - a 3D view of what is beneath your feet using GPS technology much like Google Earth. There is currently no update information of the underground services and the Utillix App will provide Augmented location visuals of all the underground services, all at a touch of a button. We believe that this App is a perfect crowd sharing tool for home owners, the construction and utilities industries.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The biggest challenge we face is the complexity and volume of information to be inputted. Therefore, a behind the scenes company will need to be established to relay all information to subscribers in the most efficient way feasible.

We can also not rely on 2D drawings currently provided for the location of utilities because of inaccuracies. Instead will use the uploaded information from subscribers with the GPS pinpoint and utility description from tags prompts provided.e.g E for electric. W for water.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello and thank you for the time and consideration for Boh inventing's newest consumer app product. Boh Inventors, inc is a US based consumer and medical product think tank. We dream it up! Do our best to get it out to you, the consumer! We are also #quirkyinventors with the 'BEAM' work light scheduled to be released in the near future.  (to find out more about Boh inventing check out our youtube channel, search: "bohinventing," and also find us on quirky.com {search: boh inventing}). "boh inventing" everywhere!
     Today we are introducing the #audiojackalarm security application to the world. Upfront, the reason you would want this product is if you tend to lose your phone, or feel your phone could be stolen you want 'data' security as well, (kids especially). If you have ever lost a phone, or had this happen to you, or a loved one and you would like it to STOP then let me tell you why #audiojackalarm is right for you. Instantaneous results! #audiojackalarm lets you know the second your device becomes disconnected with alarm, and also keep others out of your stuff it it should become lost, or stolen. All for just $3! The alarm trigger system activates to all your favorite ports, not just one. We incorporate most common ports today (audiojack, usb, hdmi) that exist on your smart phone and tablet, laptop...etc. The application developed will download from google play, or istore and work on any fully equipped device and work to be perfectly functional and protect your from theft, hijack, or loss. 
     #Audiojackalarm security app ever defeats theft and drop loss, and device disconnection the second it happends on all your smart devices.
      As a serial inventor I try and remember to share how I came up with my ideas. This app concept struck me of course after losing my phone in a public area. I know this has happened to more than myself before. I plan my night out and then go out w/ wallet and phone. I keep my phone in my pocket and somehow at the end of my night it has slipped out, or gotten lost due to loose pockets, pickpocketing, a drop I failed to notice, I was having too much fun...etc..etc. Truthfully, the specifics are not important just that I lost my phone and had some very important data on my phone, who knew if I would ever get my stuff back? What if there was a better way? How can I use people and technology to help others who lose their phones as well? 
     These thoughts resulted in #audiojackalarm. I came up with a tether concept system that is pretty much infalable while the device is powered. Now you can charge in a public setting and turn your back. Instead, using your headphones for only music how about we give them a second purpose, why not? Thus #audiojackalarm repurposes the existing ports in a very specific function as an security alarm trigger device that is activated upon disconnect. Boh was the 1st to turn your headphones into security devices and I keep at it. Make no mistake #audiojackalarm will be born, but we need your help...,
     Yes, there are other newer apps that use bluetooth to tether devices, but they actually have some very interesting limitations that our app does not. (For example: #audiojackalarm notifies the "instant" loss happens, whereas bluetooth tethering only activates with "distance seperation," thus #audiojackalarm leaves no margin for error. This one simple advantage seems menial, but it will only take one loss to prove to you would prefer our methodology. For example: If you were hi-jacked in a van, you and your phone together the bluetooth app goes along for the ride. Seems pretty expensive and kind of useless when you think there is no gonna be any activation?!? The first time this ever happens to you, or a loved one, you will be my customer for life...!)
       These simple and small key differences make giant arguments for the existance of such an app. Here's another example: #audiojackalarm locks users out with activation, whereas bluetooth will leave your phone open for inspection within a certain amount of distance, even if someone pic your phone up and sifts through the data. Keep in mind there is way to tell #auadiojackalarm, so someone who has been going through your stuff might in for a real surprise in the office! Plus there is no putting the kids to sleep via bluetooth tether. With us you just pull the cord and let #audiojackalarm do the rest. 
       Plus #audiojackalarm is capable of single alarm activation with single finger operation just by pulling the cord. We ensure your phone screams bloody murder, if its ever disconnected! The instant the loss happens, you will know it!  Whereas bluetooth cannot promise anything,
      The #audiojackalarm community will grow and you will benefit from this, as everybody wins. It is with our users best interest to grow the network as more people will receive 'vicinity notices' from other activated alarms in the area. That helps to assure your data and phone get returned/ recovered safely. If your phone does get lost additionally just locate it using global GPS, works anywhere in the world. 
      Bonuses of the app include policing the kids while sitting at the house as the video explains. You can use this app as a tool to get the kids to bed, or ground your daughter, or son when they misbehave with parental control over their favorite smart device.
       If any of this sounds like a good idea to you then I encourage you to become a part of the #audiojackalarm team and help us get this product to the global market. Follow us on the socials (@audiojackalarm) and contribute, play our soundtrack, if nothing else. Together we are making the community responsible for returning your precious lost devices. This is "good looking out" for one another app and a very easy and a new way to ensure you our your loved one "Never loses their smart phone, ipad, or tablet again!
   As stated we will deliver on the listing, the app works as described. #audiojackalarm needs to be funded and finalized to come to fruition.
        Please note that Boh inventing is the 1st to conceptualize and invent this app concept for the world and this is why we feel we would should be the 1st to bring this awesome security application to market. Thank you for your time and consideration to this app concept product.

campaign.story:
Deal With It
   The New Drinking Game For Every Party                    
Deal With It is a highly intoxicating drinking card game. Players take turns drawing cards until the cards or the players hit the deck. The deck is made up of two types of cards that allow  you to deal out forfeits to your friends forcing them to take a drink or carry out a ridiculous action.
The game gets more and more intense with each white card put in play, the different combination of rules work together with the black cards making for fun and twisted gameplay that will keep you on your toes.
So if you’re into drinking, card games and chilling with your friends then we think you will love our game as much as we do!
The Origin Story
In my first year as a university student, I lived in a massive residence hall. I brought with me a lifetime love of board and card games.
Last year, I created a new game called “Twist of Fate” which I developed with my University class mates  board game society.
The feedback we got was astounding. When we first debuted it, people were literally running toward us to ask us about the game and give it a try. Seeing their enthusiasm sparked a passion in me to create games that connect people. 
At the same time, drinking games like Kings was a great way to meet new people. I loved going to different rooms and seeing the different rules everyone played with. 
This got me thinking...
What if you could take all those 'house rules' and put them into one game? There was no way to do it with a conventional deck of cards, because you can’t assign two different rules to one card. I needed to create a new game with its own dedicated cards. I got in contact with Vincent to help me carry this game forward and thus, Deal With It and our little team was born.

The Game 
Deal With It is a drinking card game that takes ideas from your favourite games and puts a twist on them. The deck currently consists of 52 cards (just like a conventional playing card deck) containing two different types of cards.
Black cards are Action cards. These are the standard Kings rules you’re used to (“2 is you,” “3 is me,” etc). In order to come up with the best collection of Actions, we surveyed students at my university and beyond about their favourite "house rules" and compiled a database of rules. The Action cards in Deal With It include such cards as “Mercy,” “Fuck You,” “Categories,” and “Kings Cup.” 
White cards are Active cards. These are permanent rules that affect everyone at the table for as long as the cards are in play. For example, if you play “No D Words,” no one is allowed to use a word that starts with ‘D.’ If you break the rule and the other players catch you, you drink! There is also a special Deal With It! card. If you draw this card, keep it hidden, and when someone tells you to drink, you can play this card and turn the tables, forcing that player to drink for you. They’ll just have to “Deal with it!”
                  We have a finished design, a working prototype, and now we are ready to put Deal With It into mass production. In order to do so, we need help from you to reach the funding goal and to put the first run into production. Funding will also go toward marketing and promotion. By backing this campaign, you will be guaranteed a deck of your own and be one of the first people to begin play testing Deal With It on a wider scale. 

If we exceed the funding goal, we will be able to offer all kinds of fantastic perks to our loyal contributors. We will be able to get to work on creating expansions for the game, and higher tier contributors can get access to limited edition cards, design their own cards for future expansions, or even play test the game with us, the creators! We want to offer as many incentives as possible to those who are able to donate the money we need to make this happen. 


 If you enjoy drinking games or card games like Cards Against Humanity, then Deal With It is perfect for you. Sharing your enthusiasm for Deal With It with your friends is just as valuable as a financial contribution. The more people who get excited about this, the bigger and better the final product will be.

We are committed to creating games that connect people, and I hope you will share this commitment with me. Please take a moment to share this campaign on your social media profiles and get the word out there.

#dealwithitgame

Follow us on Twitter: @dealwithitgame 
                 Facebook: Deal With It game

We have a great product and want to tell everyone about it, please support our campaign and try out our cool game for yourself!

How I understood the rules is that everyone is supposed to have their own drink (or, in the case of my test run, case of beer) and when the card flips to start filling the cup, you use the beer that you are using when you drink. That's what makes the card that makes you drink the cup so scary. In our group, we had to drink a mixture of IPA, Bud Light with Lime and a Belgian White. Not the greatest combination, but funny to watch someone struggle through it. My group also changed the rules for how cards are played where we have a hand of 3 cards, if a card comes up in your hand that specifically makes YOU drink, you HAVE to play that right then and there, and then redraw a card for that card that was played. That way no one knows if you have a Deal With It card. Just having that card sitting in front of you made it so no one played anything on you in fear of you flipping that card, which led to some of us not drinking.

campaign.story:
Great stories need to be told…
     This story was originally written for children, to show them that both beauty and pain exist in the world and that life isn’t about embracing one and fearing the other but learning how they inform one another. Growing up is hard, no matter the generation. I wrote Earthking to show young readers that they are not alone in their adolescent trials. The character of Col is based on my younger brothers and though they’re no longer children the lessons remain.
     Stories are what remind us we were made to dream and to do. When we’re young we have the ability to see the world with wimsy and mystery. When we grow up we tend to lose that. Earthking is my attempt to recapture that wonder, to remind readers both young and old to dream and to do.
     Great stories need to be told. Please consider helping me tell mine.
     The funds raised for this project will go toward printing, editing, registration and conversion costs.
Check out the Earthking website for a peek at Chapter 1!
www.earthkingchronicles.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Any project comes with inherent risks. Thankfully, I have a great support system of authors who have previously gone through the self-publishing process. Their input has been invaluable and I know will continue to be. I’ve prepared for this process as much as I can by having the artwork completed, securing an editor and finding a publishing service.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi Friends,
  Earthking has been live for nearly a month! The response to this project has been amazing. After working on this book for so long hearing from readers has been one of the greatest rewards for my work. Thank you again for your support through this journey.
   Everyone should have received their rewards by now. If for any reason you did not please let me know so I can make sure we fix that.
 If you've read Earthking I would love for you to leave an honest review on the Amazon page. Any reviews posted are a tremendous help! 

  Lastly, I've been working daily on the as-yet-untitled book 2. Col's story is continuing in ways I'm very excited about and I hope you'll join me next year (tentatively) for the next part of the Earthking Chronicles!  
   Chris

Hi Friends,
 To celebrate the release of Earthking I'll be having a book release party/signing on Monday, October 26th at Speckled Hen Coffee in Strasburg, PA from 6:30pm to 8:30pm. I would be thrilled for as many of you as possible to come out! If you're in the area I would love to thank you in person for your contribution to the project, no matter how big or small. If you do plan on coming, please let me know so I can have any rewards there for you. Otherwise, I'll be sending out everyone's rewards in the days prior to that. I've created an event over at the Earthking Chronicles facebook page if you want to rsvp there.

Hey Friends!
 Thanks again to all of you for helping to make this happen. We are nearing the finish line! The paperback edition is complete and will be ordered from the printer this week, the ebook conversion is in process, posters and bumper stickers are done(and look great, I might add!) and bookmarks will be coming next week. The only hurtle we’re still working on is the hardcover edition. We’ve run into some trouble with the formatting but things should be straightened out in a day or two. (Fingers crossed!) As it stands I’m planning to send out your rewards the third full week in October. I’ll keep you posted once we get a firm date set. In the meantime, check the Earthking Chronicles Facebook page for any minor updates and pics of the products we’ve gotten in so far. Also, if you haven’t completed the survey I sent you please do so that I know where/how to send you your rewards!

updates.update_userinfo: Like a Train through a Tunnel
updates.update_content:
Hi Friends,
     After the Kickstarter campaign ended I took a few steps back to focus on the story again. I had a list of things I wanted to clarify, change or just plain get rid of. I’ve been over this book a dozen times already and thought the final edit would be another exercise in speed reading. Just making sure everything fit.

Our campaign has wrapped and I couldn’t be happier. All of you helped make something great possible! My goal for launching the book and getting it into your hands is still October. I’ll be taking some time in the very near future to give the book one final edit before I send it off to the copyeditor. During the time she has the book I’ll be getting all of your rewards ready as well as getting everything set on the publishing end of things. I’ll also be contacting everyone for shipping addresses and other needed info.
     Stay tuned for further updates as Summer progresses and be sure to keep an eye on for sneak peeks and specials in the coming weeks and months!
     Once again, a big thank you to everyone who backed this project!

After stalling for an interminable few days we came into this week with less than 10 days left and over a $1000 to go. I’ll admit, I let my doubts get to me for a little bit. I was sure we were sunk, but on Monday something amazing began to happen.
     You guys showed up. Big time!
     Friends, friends of friends and even people I’d never met began to give and give generously. I’ve been blown away by the generosity of each and every one of you and I can’t thank you enough for getting us here! Here soon I’ll sit down and pore over the book one last time before sending it to my editor. Then, while she does her thing I’ll be getting all of your rewards ready and getting everything set for publishing. The current target for launching the book is October. I’ll update with a more definite date once I have a better idea of when that will be as well as details for a book launch party for those of you who can make it.

campaign.story:
We're excited to be bringing Thai Elephant Pants to the world! We're on a mission, to create the world’s most comfortable pants! While we're at it, quite possibly, boxer shorts too!
2 Styles for waistline, shirred elastic band, and elastic band beaded rope. (can interchange upon request!)
7 Types of Elephant Pants, Original, Traditional, Skinny, Extra Wide, Women's, Palazzo, and Aladdin.
Women's Elephant Pants were designed with curvy women in mind. 
Our goal is to create the ultimate in comfort and style, harem pants, your way! You pick the style, print, color, and size. 
Don't see your size? No problem! Add $10 dollars to your pledge to custom fit just for you! 2XL, big and tall, no problem! Simply send us your measurements or size and we'll make to suit!
What We Are Offering Here on Kickstarter: Pants, + Capri, Shorts, Aladdin, T-Shirts, Rompers, Jumpsuits, Dresses, Kids Clothing, Headbands, and other accessories! 
Women's Elephant, Traditional Elephant, Palazzo Elephant, and Original Elephant Pants
Men's Long Shorts, Unisex Short & Long Boxer Shorts, Women's Short Shorts
Aladdin Jumpsuit Pants & Women's Elephant Jumpsuits
Kids Harem Pants, Aladdin Jumpsuit Pants, Star Dress, Cargo Elephant Pants
Star Dress, Strapless Tie Dress, Shirred Strapless Maxi, Gypsy Long Dress
What's special about our pants?
We're a boutique manufacturer, solely dedicated to Thai rayon fabric. We take great pride in creating quality made Thai rayon harem pants. Using high quality materials, each one is handmade by us with love and care. Are pants were designed to be as comfortable as possible, without compromise. 
Wider at the waist, hips, allowing more breathing room and wider range of movement. 
Instead of a one size fits all approach, ours pants come in M, L & XL. 
Big & tall available for those interested, even tailoring to measure!
Double stitched seams, inside and out. Double stitched exterior along the crotch.
Larger cargo pockets, shirred at the top.
Shirred vs. elastic band leg holes, which are superior in comfort.
Our mission is simple, to create the world's most comfortable pants. We've taken great strides by personally designing, sourcing the best materials, stress testing, modifying, tweaking, entirely redesigning our pants. 
Exclusive Kickstarter Rewards!
A large list of things to choose from! Most items have at least a few variations, and can be made in any pattern, and color available.
After the campaign ends, a survey is sent to select the exact item pledged, including the pattern, color, size and style.
Bringing True Value!
By now you've noticed our incredibly low prices. Not only do we believe in bringing the best value for our customers, we want everyone to experience what freedom for their legs feels like!
That is why... shipping is completely FREE. What you see for our rewards, is what you pay! Period.
It doesn't stop there, we give back 10% to charity, helping to educate, empower, cloth, bring food, water, protection, and hope to the women of Pakistan. This is the real driver for us.
Kickstarter Mission Goals:
As the saying goes... reach for the stars! We've had a lot of work done so that we can scale this little business into something much larger. But we can't do it alone, we need your help! 
Our initial goal of $3,000, allows us to start the project from our two current patterns in stock - playful elephant design and the colorful stripes. 
There are literally hundreds of patterns out in the marketplace to choose from. It would be boring to just have a single pattern. We've hand selected the best current patterns available, and will display them here for everyone to pick.
New pattern just added to our existing two!
Please vote on the next pattern in the comments section!
If there is significant interest in a particular pattern, we can always order more, so not to worry. If we run out of a particular pattern, we can choose a very similar one as a replacement. Our disclaimer in case we run out of a certain pattern or color.  :)
Batch of patterns below for reference. Usually consisting of elephant, peacock feather, floral, harem, tribal, various stripes, including others.
Our next goal is getting to $10,000 dollars, this allows us to get our own dedicated website. Currently our site is stationed on our www.savvyladiesboutique.com website, which is fine and good. Except, it's a lot better to have your own dedicated website. With your help we can create a very cool website that these pants deserve!
As pledges keep coming in, we'll need more people to help us produce these wonderful pants. Applicants are ready, we just need to give them a job! 
At $20,000 something very interesting happens. There is a slightly thicker rayon available at the factory for purchase. However, it's very difficult to obtain, because it requires special ordering, and in large dollar amounts. But, if we hit this goal, we can start to purchase in this new slightly thicker rayon fabric. In search of perfection, we decided, we have to try!
Official Thai Elephant Pants T-Shirts!
What Kickstarter campaign would be complete without one? We're partnered up with Fine Designs, (www.finedesigns.com) to make our high quality super soft cotton shirts.
Currently, working on a new line of T-Shirt designs, we only hope we can reach our funding goal to make this a reality!
Savvy Boutique, a retail boutique in Charlotte, NC, has agreed to set aside space for us in their retail store. Help get TEP on retail store shelves!
Savvy Boutique storefront, can you spot our products?
Our ultimate goal is to not only bring Thai Elephant Pants to America, but bring jobs too! It requires a lot of money to buy a lot of fabric, and ship it all by container. But plans are in place to produce our pants stateside, in Charlotte, North Carolina. 
TEP will bring the perfect fusion, when East meets West. Fabric imported from Thailand. Made in America.
PLAY

Our Story...
Beginning of last year my fiancee and I, started selling vintage clothing on Etsy under Savvy Ladies in Bangkok, Thailand. Later that year we opened, www.savvyladiesboutique.com. At the same time, back home, we opened a brick & mortar store, Savvy Boutique, in Charlotte, North Carolina. 
We always dreamed of creating our own clothing however. Dina was a seamstress, and knew just the people to contact. We realized there were more able bodies than work very quickly. So we bought a few sewing machines and started producing prototypes. 
We sent many samples back home to our shop. Our parents, along with my brothers would try everything on, giving us valuable feedback. We made many revisions, until we finally got it right. We knew then, we had created something that didn't exist, we had created what maybe the world's most comfortable pants!
But that's not all. Why we started selling vintage to begin with was with one goal in mind. Dina was from Pakistan. She had opened my eyes to the suffering, poverty and oppression in her home country. From the beginning we have been donating 10% of all our proceeds to women's charity causes in Pakistan.
Pakistani artist made this for us, we just had to share!
You can't ask for donations on Kickstarter. But we can certainly give back 10% of our sales! 
As a VIP member, we want to keep our customers posted on the things we're doing to help improve the lives of young women in Pakistan. So long after this campaign is over, your pledges will go a long way, and may change someones life forever!
Our Qualifications:
Business expertise and execution are the two biggest and most important aspects of any business or project. Myself I've been selling for a living, online and offline for well over a decade. I've worked both in the retail clothing sector, as well as managed a retail jewelry store. Online, operated two major eBay Gold Powerseller accounts, selling gemstones, jewelry and electronics. 
For projects like this, you need a team however. And I'm proud to say our team is more like a family than just co-workers. Everyone is close, friendly, and is specialized in their field. 
TEP Team:  
My fiancee, co-founder, full-time designer, part-time model.
Two stitchers, working together in tandem, with years of experience.
Myself, who primarily handles online affairs, including social media.
Factory manager, product quality control, handles orders, and shipping.
More than a few people off site that, help us with graphics work and advertising.
Questions?
We'd love to hear from you! We'll be checking multiple times a day, everyday, for 30 days, so please don't hesitate to write us!
Thank you everybody for your generosity and support!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team has years of experience creating some of the world's most comfortable pants. All customers will receive a survey at the end of the campaign, where we ask for the type, pattern, color and size of selected pledge. Each one is printed out and made to order. During the campaign we can gauge what fabric we need to buy, and how much we'll need. We operate by the wire, meaning we won't have to wait until the project is over to start working. This saves a lot of time, and ensures we can get our items to our beloved customers quickly as possible.

To speed up the process further we will ship all US orders to our hub in Charlotte, NC by DHL Express. Within a few days our pants will be stateside and will be ready to be forwarded by USPS. International customers will have all orders processed here in Bangkok, Thailand and sent by Thailand Post Economy Air SAL. For those interested in faster shipping time, please contact us. Usually Priority from Economy is about 50% more expensive; cost is based on weight.

We understand some transactions may fail upon completion of the project for various reasons. No worries, we communicate with all our customers and in cases like that, we will contact you first. No customer is left behind.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
